content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #168

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Request for updated FHIRcast library

Submitted by Ron Parker on behalf of Kenn Sinn
HL7 Canada (ken.sinn@ehealthontario.on.ca )
Chapter/section: GitHub
Url: https://github.com/fhircast
Type: A-S Enhancement
In Person requested: Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Summary: Request for updated FHIRcast library

Comment: The current sandbox implementation has some known bugs. Will there be an updated reference library available in the future, that will be supported and maintained?

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Request for updated FHIRcast library

Submitted by Ron Parker on behalf of Kenn Sinn
HL7 Canada (ken.sinn@ehealthontario.on.ca )
Chapter/section: GitHub
Url: https://github.com/fhircast
Type: A-S Enhancement
In Person requested: Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Summary: Request for updated FHIRcast library

Comment: The current sandbox implementation has some known bugs. Will there be an updated reference library available in the future, that will be supported and maintained?

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

isaacvetter commented on Issue #168

Hey Kenn,

The opensource libraries at https://github.com/fhircast are implementation materials outside of the normative-track content and are intended to be supplemental material that is not part of the specification and is not being balloted.

That said, we believe that developer-friendly materials and resources, like a sandbox, a reference implementation and opensource libraries are vitally important to enabling a standards-based project. For FHIRcast, these materials are entirely volunteer-contributed. There's no funding here.

Please start by submitting bug reports on the appropriate repo? We also welcome PRs for bug fixes.

Isaac

Proposed Resolution: Not Related

isaacvetter assigned Issue #168

wmaethner commented on Issue #168:

## :landline: II Working Group Vote (6-18-2019)
Block vote

@isaacvetter moved the following disposition, seconded by Ricardo Quintano Neira

Disposition: Persuasive
Disposition Comment: Will fix as described in the issue comments or by the commenter

:+1: For: 10
:expressionless: Abstain: 2
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
